scene_description_enriched: In a pastoral landscape, several figures in monastic robes are depicted looking upwards with awe and reverence. One figure kneels beside a flock of sheep, while others stand. Above them, an angel descends from the sky, its wings outstretched. In the background, rolling hills are dotted with trees and a distant building, possibly a church or castle, is visible. The scene is framed by an ornamental border.
